hero.headline: Crafting Excellence in Every Bottle
hero.description: Experience our legacy of winemaking, where tradition meets innovation in every bottle of our exquisite Italian Riesling.

wine.subtitle: Our Wine
wine.title: Italian Riesling
wine.tastingNotes: Elegant aromas of white flowers and citrus, with hints of honey and stone fruits. Fresh and balanced with a long mineral finish.
wine.production: Hand-harvested and carefully vinified in small batches (600-700L) to preserve the authentic character of our terroir.

contact.title: Visit Our Family Cellar

contact.visitInfo: We welcome visitors for personalized wine tastings and cellar tours. Please contact us in advance to schedule your visit.

heritage.title: Heritage
heritage.description: Four generations of family winemaking tradition since 1920, preserving our ancestors' knowledge and passion.

terroir.title: Terroir
terroir.description: Our vineyards benefit from the unique microclimate and soil of the Királyhelmec wine region.

craft.title: Craft
craft.description: Specializing in Italian Riesling, producing limited quantities (600-700L) with meticulous attention to detail.

1920.title: The Foundation
1920.description: Our great-grandfather established the first family vineyard in Kisgéres (Malý Horeš).

1950.title: Second Generation
1950.description: Expanding the vineyards and focusing on traditional winemaking methods.

1980.title: Italian Riesling Focus
1980.description: The third generation specialized in Italian Riesling production.

2020.title: Modern Era
2020.description: Fourth generation continues the legacy while embracing modern winemaking techniques.

winemaker.subtitle: Meet the Winemaker
winemaker.title: Family Tradition & Expertise
winemaker.description1: As a fourth-generation winemaker, Tibor Filep continues the family's century-old winemaking tradition in Malý Horeš. His deep connection to the land and vines began in his childhood, learning from his father and grandfather.
winemaker.description2: Today, he combines traditional winemaking methods with modern expertise, focusing on producing exceptional Italian Riesling that truly represents our terroir.
winemaker.description3: Beyond winemaking, Tibor is dedicated to preserving and sharing our region's rich wine culture, welcoming visitors to experience our family's heritage firsthand.
winemaker.experience: Four generations of winemaking expertise since 1920
winemaker.specialty: Italian Riesling with a focus on traditional methods
